programme.desc: An interview with the former boxer, who reigned supreme in the featherweight division in the latter half of the 1990s, but came unstuck when he faced Marco Antonio Barrera. Hamed first won the WBO title in 1995 when he dethroned Steve Robinson, and also went on to claim the IBF and WBC belts before suffering the sole loss of his career to Barrera in Las Vegas in 2001, and retired after one final bout against Manuel Calvo in 2002.(n)

These sides have already met for a three-game T20 series earlier in the summer, with the home side coming out on top following a 19-run victory in the decisive third fixture in Cardiff. programme.title: Live - Wimbledon 2017
programme.desc: Coverage of day seven at the All England Club, where the men's and ladies' fourth-round singles matches are due to get under way. Andy Murray recorded a 7-5, 6-1, 6-4 victory over the mercurial Nick Kyrgios at the corresponding stage of last year's tournament, while Roger Federer defeated Steve Johnson in straight sets to also secure his passage to the next round. Meanwhile, Serena Williams made light work of number 13 seed Svetlana Kuznetsova, beating her 7-5, 6-0 to move into the quarter-finals.(n)

programme.desc: Coverage of day eight at the All England Club, where the ladies' quarter-final singles matches are due to take place.
